title: EventHandlers type error, DOM's Event  was tainted by `@types/node`
body:
### Version 2.7.13 ### Reproduction link [www.typescriptlang.org/play](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?ts=4.8.4#-FtfoAYhWq2DG5WNMnW1XTi2m+2s8JOxoSIie23kwAhURBDOgQcq0v2I4uH428W4TCIT1gidwI7QU7oEfXLF+gCSiEPcuTACVNNAr-3EABlUJOSPHsV28-cTASfkfilqCpcQnDNNAV1rVk1nef9k04SBHBnedKVAABraAVChT4az+O0AGkMLIEhpEQMECMw0lk3I9AYA0HxQHIrCyQLP1yM1MiMKY5CgNAJxhw0cDmVZABBIJZmQCRkFQsE2H46BkxRKSZLkhThEJWZsCcPggmUqt5MfJhUgkyRpNAWS9OTcyBKIkjdIEyy5MDGcrP0ljhBc+NMETMyVMfFy+O8lyHL04c5SCvy5LTIMfIsiK9PYmL7MNFCtLIcRMBwuthGEt48wAu1AQ3dBREwUF8r9QqLxKlQ8EcII-FwbcDOnHAeWQddNyJcqRRpbloFgx9OBQSA1EJAa3OVRAKHGk9hGgoZ+u1TAmom+bpq07AhhwZbusQNbcwfCa8T0lbZsQHFqtOz8-Qu0rTidXacUcPxaPom8cB6Dqt12p9oGgdCZuu4Rfv++6rtZJ9NtEeNAYhqt1Cm8G7QAFRA6BNW1LrkwANRIKctPajdvuTAB1TB6U3cGFwE+MpB5TKIegWnDpLFCAFVTwZu0n2QRxobBDnuLAbBh3arm-WR0XcGQDdUFEMFJaCdrk0V9qvVAVXcBVqWAq6zXtaV3ADoVqWhapQ5TkJSBxdxEhLYQGzSNAHE7bOSBkxd+3IF1sFPbdj3XathK-atgOvZllAmd9wOEDDt2nOjr246tzzvJD2PH3Txx00T-3M5juq5Szs3QGkXA-tEG3EBJ8uo9AGuK5LjcQNaxkINwv1hMQFupUQY3QC7nueWTQfQN79XR9b5VH0n3vAgQKewVn4fkp47BTT7pUq+Rjf9V5RGNd3pUVaP3v+53jc95VABfBgpg-AAJDcyHjSANHATgaCMe5-gAbTw0Apw0IYRILALgABdAA-Nuf+4DvgaT5NWesQQUC91AJArgsDQBggABRYBUGkIYMC8LgIAJRGC-twO2ZA6C3z0GoNAwloaimrMYUUT8pqv3fiw+gdAKASQ+GgIQfcBC-lECwpezChL8JKjAawIj4HqCkGCcAyMaA4J-FOPW5D8CUOoXsA4PRsDgBwe3Oyrl+A6L0XIdRYiWFhCBJJVCpCgA) ### Steps to reproduce open the reproduction link ### What is expected? `
ok
` to work ### What is actually happening? Type '() => void' is not assignable to type 'MouseEvent' --- DOM's Event was tainted by `@types/node`. `E[K]` extends Function always true ```ts type EventHandlers = { [K in keyof E]?: E[K] extends Function ? E[K] : (payload: E[K]) => void } ```
